title: Naruto Shipuuden: Narutimate Accel
description:
<{Naruto: Narutimate Accel}>

Game: Naruto: Narutimate Accel
Game Language: Japanese
US Game Release Date: Not yet available
JP Game Release Date: 4 May 2007
EU Game Release Date: Not yet available
AU Game Release Date: Not yet available
Game Region: NTSC|J <Japan>

How to burn:

You will need:

 Blank DVD R disc
 DVD recorder
 PS2 with modchip
 DVD Decrypter
 This torrent downloaded on your computer

Insert your blank DVD into your DVD recorder and open up DVD Decrypter.
Click Mode which is in between View and Mode, go to ISO and make sure it is on Write.
Under Source browse for the ISO file you downloaded from this torrent and it should say NARUTOACCEL.ISO.
Under the description where all the writing is, make sure your Write Speed is on 2.4x.
Now hit the Write button which looks like a Hard drive with an arrow pointing at a CD.
Wait for it to finish, once finished eject disc, insert into PS2 with modchip.

Play and enjoy!

Narutimate Accel introduces you to the new Shipuuden characters including all the teams, sensei's, hokages, villains, Akatsuki.
With over 20 maps and 50 characters Narutimate Accel has all new Ultimate Story mode where players can play as Naruto himself and experience the Shipuuden story!
